EmailTemplate.subject: Recruitment Drive for UTILITARIAN LABS Pvt Ltd
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
I am writing this mail on behalf of Code Gladiator’s, a training arm of UTILITARIAN LABS Pvt Ltd which is a Salesforce led software development company based in Bengaluru.
We currently have requirement of 10 Candidates for Salesforce & Android developer roles in our own company and another 10 openings in associate organization for which we intend to conduct recruitment drive.
Candidates will be selected on basis of a technical test and will undergo 45 days of technical training.
Post completion of their training student’s will be formally inducted into our company. Package of candidates will initially will be in range of 1.8-2.4 Lakhs for first six months. Our company policies are very liberal and we appraise performance of candidates biannually and compensate them fairly.
Kindly lets us know the convenient dates to conduct this recruitment drive.
Chandan Kumar Operations Head, Code Gladiators +91-9910-770-310+91-8178967083+91-9654358570(WhatsApp)
